remarks: A group multiple of the identity, for nonnegative multiple. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgnn0z.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnn0z.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgnn0z.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
mulgnn0z $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( N .x. .0. ) = .0. ) $.
